get.description:
The "Contact Info" endpoint allows ISV applications to retrieve the merchant's contact information.
By accessing this endpoint, developers can obtain a list of contact info records for the merchant,
including address, phone, etc. This information can be integrated with other endpoints of the application,
such as the invoice creation functionality.

get.description:
Use the Calculate Transaction Amount endpoint to determine the final amount to be charged to the customer.
This endpoint considers applicable discounts, percentage-off values, tips, and any Zero Cost Processing (ZCP) mode enabled for the merchant account, including Dual Pricing, Cash Discount, or Credit Card Surcharge.
The calculated amount can then be displayed on the payment terminal or POS for customer review before submitting the payment.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Base transaction amount before discounts and fees

parameters.name: surchargeRate
parameters.description: Credit Card Surcharge rate (if applicable) or leave empty to use the default Credit Card Surcharge rate setting in the merchant account

parameters.name: tipAmount
parameters.description: Absolute amount of tip to be added

parameters.name: tipRate
parameters.description: Relative value of tip to be added

parameters.name: useCardPrice
parameters.description: Set to true to calculate transaction amount for card payment, or false for cash or ACH payment

contactInfos.description: A list of contact information entries associated with the merchant.

zeroCostProcessingOption.description:
Zero Cost Processing Option name
None = 1
CashDiscount = 2
DualPricing = 3
Surcharge = 4

isCustomerCardSavingByTerminalEnabled.description: Can the terminal save customer's card after the transaction is processed.

currencyId.description: Currency Id. Possible values can be found in AvailableCurrencies. For example, 1 = USD

currencyIsoCode.description: Currency ISO Code. For example, USD

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.AccountHo.title: AccountHolderType
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.AccountHo.description:
Account holder type

Possible values:

  • 1 - Business: Business
  • 2 - Personal: Personal

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.AccountTy.title: AccountType
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.AccountTy.description:
Account type

Possible values:

  • 1 - Checking: Checking
  • 2 - Savings: Savings

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.Ach.AchSE.title: AchSECCode
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.Ach.AchSE.description:
Standard Entry Class constant that denotes the way a customer authorized a payment.

Possible values:

  • 1 - Web: Internet-Initiated/Mobile Entries. Default value.
  • 2 - PPD: Prearranged Payment and Deposit Entries.
  • 3 - CCD: Corporate Credit or Debit.
  • 4 - Telephone: Telephone-Initiated Entries.

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.AvsCodeGr.title: AvsCodeGroupType
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.AvsCodeGr.description:
Possible values:

  • 1 - NoMatch:
  • 2 - PartialMatch:
  • 3 - Incompatible:
  • 4 - Unavailable:
  • 5 - ValidGroup:

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.CardDataS.title: CardDataSource
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.CardDataS.description:
Possible values:

  • 1 - Internet: Virtual Terminal, ISV API
  • 2 - Swipe: Track1, Track2
  • 3 - NFC: EMV Tags, Track2
  • 4 - EMV: EMV Tags
  • 5 - EMVContactless: EMV Tags
  • 6 - FallbackSwipe: Track 2
  • 7 - Manual: Card present keyed transaction.

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.CardType.title: CardType
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.CardType.description:
Available card types (brands). Note: This is a simplified list; Discover and Diners are the same etc.

Possible values:

  • 0 - Unknown:
  • 1 - Visa:
  • 2 - MasterCard:
  • 3 - AmericanExpress:
  • 4 - DinersClub:
  • 5 - Discover:
  • 6 - JCB:

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.Cardholde.title: CardholderAuthenticationMethod
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.Cardholde.description:
Possible values:

  • 0 - NotAuthenticated:
  • 1 - PIN:
  • 2 - ElectronicSignatureAnalysis:
  • 3 - ManualSignature:
  • 4 - ManualOther:
  • 5 - Unknown:
  • 6 - SystematicOther:
  • 7 - ETicketEnvAmex:
  • 8 - OfflinePin:

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.ResponseC.title: ResponseCode
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.ResponseC.description:
A vendor independent response code.

Possible values:

  • 0 - Approve: Operation fully or partially approved.
  • 1 - Decline: Operation declined.
  • 2 - Error: Something prevents to complete the operation. Request format is wrong, or system error, or any other reason that prevented to the request normal processing.

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.TokenType.title: TokenType
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.TokenType.description:
Card Token type

Possible values:

  • 1 - Local: Regular
  • 2 - Network: Network

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.Transacti.title: TransactionType
PaymentGateway.Contracts.Enums.Transacti.description:
Possible values:

  • 1 - Authorization:
  • 2 - Sale:
  • 3 - Capture:
  • 4 - Void:
  • 5 - Refund:
  • 6 - CardAuthentication:
  • 7 - RefundWORef:
  • 8 - TipAdjustment:
  • 11 - AchDebit:
  • 12 - AchRefund:
  • 13 - AchHold:
  • 14 - AchUnHold:
  • 15 - AchCancel:
  • 16 - AchCredit:

useBillingAsShippingAddress.description: Use billing address as shipping address
Use billing address as shipping address
Use billing address as shipping address

tapToPayStatus.description: Tap To Pay status : Inactive, Requested, Approved, Active, Denied

tapToPayStatusId.description: Tap To Pay status Id : Inactive = 0, Requested = 1, Approved = 2, Active = 3, Denied = 4

tapToPayEnabled.description: Indicates whether Tap To Pay feature is enabled

devices.description: List of devices associated with the current merchant.

clientSecret.description: Client secret (only shown once during creation)

percentageOffRate.description: The percent of Amount. to be discounted.

surchargeRate.description: The percent of transaction amount to be added to Amount after PercentageOffRate is applied.

useCardPrice.description:
Parameter is mandatory when merchant has ZeroCostProcessingOption == Dual Pricing. 
Parameter must be null when merchant has other ZeroCostProcessingOption. 
For Dual Pricing, amount should be the card price and useCardPrice should be "true", or amount should be the cash price and useCardPrice should be "false".

accountNumber.description:
The 13-19 digit card number used for the transaction.
This field may contain a token issued against a card number. This is de-tokenized by TransIT to process the transaction.

securityCode.description: The three or four digit security code on the credit card.

expirationMonth.description: The expiration month of the card

expirationYear.description: The expiration year of the card

track1.description: The card data from track 1 of the magnetic stripe.

track2.description: Information stored on the magnetic stripe of a credit or debit card, including the card number, expiration date, and cardholder's name.

emvTags.description: Each tag corresponds to a particular piece of data stored on the card.

emvPaymentAppVersion.description: The version number of the payment application in use.

customerInitiatedTransaction.description:
Customer Initiated Transaction if true
Merchant Initiated Transaction if false
Default value - false.

processedAmount.description: Indicates which amount is authorized. The amount may differ from the amount in the request.

salesTaxRate.description: Sales tax rate. Decimal Number. Max length=4. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot) Allowed range: 0.01 - 100

invoiceNumber.description: The Value Added Tax(VAT) invoice number associated with the transaction. Max length=15. Allowed characters: a-z A-Z 0-9 Space

purchaseOrder.description: The value used by the customer to identify an order. Issued by the buyer to the seller. Max length=25. Allowed characters: a-z A-Z 0-9 Space

shippingCharges.description: The dollar amount for shipping or freight charges applied to a product or transaction. Numeric. Max length=12. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot)

dutyCharges.description: Indicates the total charges for any import or export duties included in the order. Numeric. Max length=12. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot)

products.description: You can send multiple products in a request

track1.description: The card data from track 1 of the magnetic stripe.

track2.description: Information stored on the magnetic stripe of a credit or debit card, including the card number, expiration date, and cardholder's name.

emvTags.description: Each tag corresponds to a particular piece of data stored on the card.

emvPaymentAppVersion.description: The version number of the payment application in use.

accountNumber.description:
The 13-19 digit card number used for the transaction.
This field may contain a token issued against a card number. This is de-tokenized by TransIT to process the transaction.

securityCode.description: The three or four digit security code on the credit card.

expirationMonth.description: The expiration month of the card

expirationYear.description: The expiration year of the card

emvTags.description:
Holds data fetched from a EMV Chip Credit/Debit card to perform transaction.
That is a string array of variable size, should be used as is.

emvPaymentAppVersion.description: The version number of the payment application in use.

pinKsn.description:
The KSN for DUKPT PIN encryption.
Required only if the PIN is encrypted using DUKPT.

debit.description: IF Debit THEN use card as a debit card, else use card as a credit card

referenceId.description: ReferenceId to distinguish two transactions conducted over a short time frame.

percentageOffRate.description: The percent of Amount. to be discounted.

surchargeRate.description: The percent of transaction amount to be added to Amount after PercentageOffRate is applied.

useCardPrice.description:
Parameter is mandatory when merchant has ZeroCostProcessingOption == Dual Pricing. 
Parameter must be null when merchant has other ZeroCostProcessingOption. 
For Dual Pricing, amount should be the card price and useCardPrice should be "true", or amount should be the cash price and useCardPrice should be "false".

accountNumber.description:
The 13-19 digit card number used for the transaction.
This field may contain a token issued against a card number. This is de-tokenized by TransIT to process the transaction.

securityCode.description: The three or four digit security code on the credit card.

expirationMonth.description: The expiration month of the card

expirationYear.description: The expiration year of the card

track1.description: The card data from track 1 of the magnetic stripe.

track2.description: Information stored on the magnetic stripe of a credit or debit card, including the card number, expiration date, and cardholder's name.

emvTags.description: Each tag corresponds to a particular piece of data stored on the card.

emvPaymentAppVersion.description: The version number of the payment application in use.

pinKsn.description:
The KSN for DUKPT PIN encryption.
Required only if the PIN is encrypted using DUKPT.

debit.description: IF Debit THEN use card as a debit card, else use card as a credit card

referenceId.description: ReferenceId to distinguish two transactions conducted over a short time frame.

customerInitiatedTransaction.description:
Customer Initiated Transaction if true
Merchant Initiated Transaction if false
Default value - false.

processorResponseCode.description: Processor-specific response code that precisely describes the operation result.

taxRate.description:
The type of tax rate.
This field is used if taxCategory is not used.
Default sale tax rate in percentage Must be between 0% - 22% ,Applicable only Level 2 AutoFill.

shippingCharge.description: The percentage for shipping or freight charges applied to a product or transaction.

dutyChargeRate.description: Indicates the percentage for any import or export duties included in the order.

code.description: The merchant assigned unique product identification code.

unitPrice.description: The unit price for the product.

measurementUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the product.

city.description: Alphanumeric and Special Character | Min Length=6 Max Length=128.

line1.description: Alphanumeric and Special Character |Min Length=6 Max Length=128.

line2.description: Alphanumeric and Special Character |Min Length=6 Max Length=128.

postalCode.description:
Zip code.
Alphanumeric and Special Character |Min Length=2 Max Length=15.

stateName.description: State name, for countries with no predefined states

stateId.description: State id for countries with predefined states

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Transactions.Ad.description:
A commonly used address structure.

Not all the fields are used in Tsys,
but, generally ought to be provided.

result.description: AVS Response Result. Passed - all address data is correct. Failed - some address data is incorrect.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer.

companyName.description: The name of the cardholder's company

PaymentGateway.Contracts.Transactions.Co.description: This group contains fields regarding a customer's contact details such as email id, phone no. etc.

name.description: The name of the product. Alphanumeric and Special Characters. Min Length=1, max length=50. Allowed special characters: Space, Slash /, Hyphen -, Comma

code.description: The merchants assigned unique product identification code. Alphanumeric and Special Characters. Min length=1, max length=20. Allowed special characters: Space, Slash /

unitPrice.description: The product amount. Numeric. Max length=12. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot)

measurementUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the product. Alphanumeric and special character Space. Max length=20

quantity.description: The quantity of a product. Decimal number. Max length=12

taxAmount.description: The tax amount established on a product. Numeric. Max length=12. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot)

discountRate.description: The discount percentage applied to a product. Corresponds with productDiscountName. This does not impact transaction functionality. It is used for reporting purposes. Numeric. Max Length=4. Allowed range:0.01 to 100

description.description: The description of the product. Alphanumeric and Special Characters. Min length=1, max length=200.

hostResponseCode.description: A two-character response code indicating the status of the authorization request

code.description: High-level operation response - approve, decline or error.

processorResponseCode.description: Processor-specific response code that precisely describes the operation result.

authCode.description: The authorization code received for the transaction.

id.description: The unique identifier of the contact information record.

addressName.description: The name or label of the address (e.g., "Main Office", "Warehouse").

addressLine1.description: The first line of the physical address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the physical address (optional).

city.description: The city where the address is located.

zip.description: The postal (ZIP) code of the address.

countryId.description: The ID of the country associated with the address.

stateId.description: The ID of the state or province, if applicable.

stateName.description: The name of the state or province, if available.

email.description: The email address associated with this contact information.

businessPhoneNumber.description: The business phone number for this contact.

merchantId.description: The ID of the merchant to whom this contact information belongs.

isMainAddress.description: Indicates whether this is the main address for the merchant.

isDefaultAddress.description: Indicates whether this is the default address used for the merchant.

ContactInfo.description: Represents a single contact information record for a merchant.

typeName.description: Type name: Card, ElectronicCheck or Cash
